mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 1

SELECT A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.MEMBER_NO , D.MEMBER_NAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.PROJECT_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.MEMBER_NO , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS , B.PROJECT_NO FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_CONTENT , C.MEMBER_NO , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS , C.PROJECT_NO FROM TBL_BOARD C
C.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = 1
ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON (A.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.PROJECT_NO FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{ noticeNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_NO , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ title } , #{ content } , 1 , 3 , 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD A SET A.BOARD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{ no }
